item.title: Preparing for Technical Interviews
item.description: My friend, Devansh, recently wrote an article about “Debunking Myths Regarding Tech Internship Applications” , and I agree with many of his points. Proofreading his article gave me the opportunity to reflect on my own personal journey through internship hunting and technical interviews in summer 2024 and I would love to share more about the systems and techniques I had used to prepare for my technical interviews. ⚠️ DISCLAIMER ⚠️
